lead_paragraph: The Washington Redskins will exercise Robert Griffin III’s fifth-year contract option for the 2016 season.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Football; Redskins to Exercise Option on Griffin
headline.main: Redskins to Exercise Option on Griffin

snippet: The Washington Redskins will exercise Robert Griffin III’s fifth-year contract option for the 2016 season.
abstract: Washington Redskins will exercise fifth-year contract option for quarterback Robert Griffin III in 2016 season; other football news noted.
